mapper.select: SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_IMAGE_INFO AS QUSTNR_TMPLAT_IMAGE_INFOPATHNM FROM COMTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_TY, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_IMAGE_INFO AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_IMAGEPATHNM, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_DC AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_CN, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_PATH_NM AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_COURS FROM COMTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1
AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_DC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
